title: How do I get rid of the legacy client icon?
body:
I don't have the option to select the new client icon, this is what appear to me in the league folder. How can I get the new client launcher?

http://i.imgur.com/RJXOLqA.png

replies.body: It doesn't look like you have the updated client yet.  What happens if you try to launch the legacy version via lol.launcher.admin.exe?  Let me know and we can go from there.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NO7tuRJQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-26T23:13:11.373+0000)
>
> It doesn't look like you have the updated client yet.  What happens if you try to launch the legacy version via lol.launcher.admin.exe?  Let me know and we can go from there.

This http://imgur.com/a/wucc8
I can perfectly play and all I just want to skip the first client (first image) directly to the new one (second) with the new icon launcher.

That's so weird!  Something must have messed up during your install.  I'd suggest downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and running a reinstall.  This will clear any old legacy files, add missing files, and get you to the most current version.  Let me know if it helps.
Ok, I did the clean uninstall and it failed :/ well i guess i'm going to keep it like that, it's not that it worries me too much anyway. But thanks for the replies.
What do you mean when you say failed?  Were there any error messages?
Is it the "clean reinstall" option? Cause I did the reinstall and nothing happened.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NO7tuRJQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-26T23:13:11.373+0000)
>
> It doesn't look like you have the updated client yet.  What happens if you try to launch the legacy version via lol.launcher.admin.exe?  Let me know and we can go from there.

Yeah I just reinstalled League and can't find the new client.

Can you tell me where I can download it?

I did the same with the repair tool to try and fix an issue with the play button not being available.  It did the same crap where it adds in this screen (even when I've been using the new client for a while now).    It also hasn't fixed the issue of not being able to use the Play button.  Something is screwed up in the install process that the repair tool is taking people through.
